item.title: Pi Install Notes
item.description: #Inital Install sudo apt update sudo apt upgrade sudo apt install avahi-daemon docker.io docker-compose sudo dpkg-reconfigure tzdata sudo adduser ljhanson sudo usermod -G docker, sudo sudo hostnamectl set-hostname pi sudo sed -r -i.orig ’s/#?DNSStubListener=yes/DNSStubListener=no/g’ /etc/systemd/resolved.conf Add hostname to /etc/hosts curl -L https://install.pivpn.io | bash sudo ufw allow ssh sudo ufw allow http sudo ufw allow https Next two needed to keep DNS/DHCP on internal network only if using ipv6 tunnel sudo ufw allow in on eth0 to any port 67 sudo ufw allow in on eth0 to any port 53
